trans-unit.source: Enables service debugging for a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] callback object.
trans-unit.target: Ativa a depuração do serviço para um [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] objeto de chamada de retorno.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The constructor creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior> object in which the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> property is the value of `includeExceptionDetailInFaults`.
trans-unit.target: O construtor cria um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior>objeto no qual o valor da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>propriedade é o valor de `includeExceptionDetailInFaults`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Controls whether a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] callback object includes managed exception information in the detail of the SOAP faults sent back to the service.
trans-unit.target: Controla se um [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] objeto de chamada de retorno inclui informações sobre excepções geridas nos detalhes das falhas SOAP enviadas para o serviço.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that controls whether client callback objects return managed exception information in SOAP faults back to the service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que controla se os objetos de chamada de retorno de cliente devolvem informações sobre excepções geridas falhas SOAP para o serviço.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] returns managed client callback exception information in the SOAP faults for service debugging purposes in duplex communication; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] devolve geridos informações de exceção de chamada de retorno de cliente na falhas SOAP para o serviço de depuração efeitos na comunicação duplex; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método para suportar o comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to modify.
trans-unit.target: O ponto final para modificar.

trans-unit.source: The objects that binding elements require to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos que necessitam de elementos de enlace para suportar o comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> para suportar o comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> property to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Atribui o valor da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>propriedade para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint that is to be customized.
trans-unit.target: O ponto final que está a ser personalizadas.

trans-unit.source: The client runtime to be customized.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de execução de cliente para serem personalizados.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> para suportar o comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException?displayProperty=fullName>; this behavior can only be used in a client application.
trans-unit.target: Emite um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException?displayProperty=fullName>; Este comportamento só pode ser utilizado numa aplicação de cliente.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: O ponto final que expõe o contrato.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint dispatcher to be modified or extended.
trans-unit.target: O despachante de ponto final a modificação ou expandido.

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementa <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> para suportar o comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to validate.
trans-unit.target: O ponto final para validar.
